column4: grrr... how do I change my password? it wont let me. has someone changed it for me?
if you've lost it, visit #freenode
thanks... ill check that...
join #freenode and ask them. they control the horizontal and vertical hold here
you wait like the rest of us. they'll give you voice in a few minutes (thanks to the spambots, they do it that way)
its been a while... prolly atleast 10 minutes...
patience, sometimes i have to wait a long time
we cannot help you in here with your password, you are gonna have to wait in #freenode and ask them

yes. I understand, im still waiting in #freenode, with 2 sessions, and usernames... still no help there. thats why I thought, hey, why dont i ask about my original problem (you know, why I came in here half an hour ago!)
why are there in another session?
because i can. because i have the password working for that one. why is it important?
why dont you have your nicks linked?
because im trying ubuntu linux, and i want to play games on yahoo games.
that has nothing to do with linking your nicknames on freenode
i understand. do you.
i do not. but to each their own
what im saying, is im trying to play some games on yahoo, but i cnat seem to using ubuntu. thats what I want to do... not do irc.
i'm still trying to figure out your freenode password thing
you are voiced in #freenode now
yes. I just asked... thanks :)
in a terminal, type "update-alternatives --list java"
paste the output into #flood
